## Security Vulnerability Report

**IMPORTANT: Please do NOT provide sensitive details publicly.**

Please email security@noorplus.github.io instead with:
- Type of vulnerability
- Affected component
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if applicable)

For more details, see [SECURITY.md](../../SECURITY.md)

---

This is a placeholder. Please contact the security team directly for vulnerability reports.
